name: XWUI Autocomplete Component
description: Autocomplete/combobox component with search functionality. Displays filtered options in a dropdown as the user types. Supports custom filtering, async search, loading states, and keyboard navigation. Uses XWUIInput and XWUIPopover internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

filterOption.description: Custom filter function for options (not serializable in JSON)

onSearch.description: Async search callback function (not serializable in JSON)

loading.description: Whether the autocomplete is in loading state

backfill.description: Whether to backfill input with first option on Enter

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the autocomplete

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
